data.quote: The weight of the world was on your shoulds and still you triumphed! Marvelous
data.author: Lord Shaxx

data.quote: Glory comes and goes, Guardian. If you want it, it can be yours again.
data.author: Lord Shaxx

data.quote: This world, it is a tempest sometimes. But remember, the sun always rises again.
data.author: Brandon Sanderson

data.quote: Death comes to all. But life comes first. Cherish it. Death is the destination. But the journey, that is life. That is what matters.
data.author: Brandon Sanderson

data.quote: Remember why we live. Remember warmth, remember good food. Remember friends, and song, and evenings spent around the hearth
data.author: Brandon Sanderson

data.quote: For the substance of our existence is not in the achievement, but in the method.
data.author: Brandon Sanderson

data.quote: The means by which we achieve victory are as important as the victory itself.
data.author: Brandon Sanderson

data.quote: Life before death. Strength before weakness. Journey before destination.
data.author: Brandon Sanderson

data.quote: He was no longer scared of what tomorrow might bring because yesterday has brought it.
data.author: Neil Gaiman

data.quote: All things must progress, and progression is not always a steady incline.
data.author: Brandon Sanderson

data.quote: No one is actually dead until the ripples they cause in the world die away.
data.author: Terry Pratchet

data.quote: Each person is a strand of story.
data.author: Neil Gaiman

data.quote: Education never ends, Watson. It is a series of lessons with the greatest for the last.
data.author: Sherlock Holmes

data.quote: Life's like a movie, write your own ending. Keep believing, keep pretending.
data.author: Jim Henson

data.quote: My hope still is to leave the world a bit better than when I got here.
data.author: Jim Henson

data.quote: The ticket to the future is always open.
data.author: Vash The Stampede

data.quote: You’ve got two legs and a heartbeat. What’s stopping you?
data.author: Inyuasha

data.quote: It's amazing what one can accomplish when one doesn't know what one can't do.
data.author: Jim Davis

data.quote: Those who can imagine anything, can create the impossible.
data.author: Alan Turing
